traits.name: Hundred Hands
traits.detail: Kentimane has 1d4+1 hands present when it attacks, and can summon more as an action. Each Hand has 100 hit points, 26 AC, and uses Kentimane's stats for its saving throws. If a Hand of Kentimane is destroyed, Kentimane takes 100 psychic damage.

actions.name: Create Hand
actions.detail: Kentimane manifests a Hand of Kentimane within 100' of its main body. That hand then makes one attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Kentimane makes four melee attacks, or two Boulder attacks. Each attack can be made by one of the Hands of Kentimane instead.

actions.name: Slam
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs. AC. _Hit:_ [damage/4, d10] bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 50' back.

actions.name: Boulder
actions.detail: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ [attack-3] vs. AC. _Hit:_ 32 (5d12) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Grasp of the Earth
actions.detail: A creature within 100' of Kentimane must make a [dc-secondary] STR save or take be grappled (escape [dc-secondary]). While grappled in this way, the creature is restrained.

actions.name: Obliterate (Overkill)
actions.detail:
Kentimane opens its core and prepares to obliterate a grappled creature that is within 10' of his body. If the creature is still grappled at the start of its next turn, still within range of the attack, and the core has not been destroyed, the creature is instantly killed.
 
 
If the core is destroyed, Kentimane is stunned until the end of its next turn, and lets go of all creatures it is grappling. Kentimane cannot use this attack again once the core has been destroyed.

actions.name: Meteor Storm (recharge 6)
actions.detail: Each creature within 1000' of Kentimane must make a DC 24 DEX save or take 50 bludgeoning damage and 50 fire damage (half damage on save).
